thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A great weekend in NYC
thread.title_full: A great weekend in NYC - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SmileyTravel
title: A great weekend in NYC
text:
My stay was nice and pleasant. The problem with TV in the room was extremely quickly handled by an engineer on duty.
On a positive note - the front desk staff was extremely professional and welcoming. They personified my stay and I am very grateful for that.
The location is great - a subway station is just a block away, and Herald square with multiple subway lines is three blocks away. Near Madison Square Garden/Penn Station, iconic Macy's, walking distance to Times Square and Rockfeller centre. Plenty of options for breakfast/lunch/dinner as the hotel bar was disappointing. GiGi cafe around the corner is superb.
I stayed in three HGI in Manhattan, and this one is the best!
